DescriptionData.Title: Wolfe FX Kits - Witch (4 colors)
DescriptionData.Description: Wolf Witch Face Painting Kit is an easy-to-use face painting makeup kit perfect for painting witch face painting designs. Wolfe makeup is safe, non-toxic water based face painting makeup. Unlike grease makeup, Wolfe face paint makeup is less likely to smear or rub off, is comfortable to wear, and cleans up easily with soap and water. The Wolfe Witch Face Painting Kit contains one turquoise cake face paint makeup, three face paint sticks (white, purple, black), one applicator sponge and detailed step by step instruction booklet with color photos. The Wolf Witch Face Painting Kit is perfect for parties or Halloween.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: The Wolfe Witch Face Painting Kit contains one turquoise cake face paint makeup, three face paint sticks (white, purple, black), one applicator sponge and detailed step by step instruction booklet with color photos
East to use for face painting for parties and costumes
Wolfe make up is of the highest quality and is less likely to smear or rub off
Goes on easily and comes off with soap and water
